QuestData.Title: More Feathers
QuestData.CompletionText: Skettis's lapdogs still keeps a close watch over us, outcasts. The moment any of us sets foot outside Shattrath we'll be as good as dead.$B$BBring me more feathers as proof of your victory over them.
QuestData.RewardText: <Vekax squawks in glee as you present him with proof of his enemies' demise.>$B$BYes, that will show Skettis that we Outcasts will not take their punishment lying down. Here is the reward I promised you. I can arrange for more, should you provide me with additional feathers.$B$B<This quest can be repeated up to Honored reputation.>
